sentences.en: Change occurs at a glacial pace.
Does glacial milk add honey what to effect there is?
sentences.cn: 冰牛奶加蜂蜜有什麽效果?

sentences.en: Eskers are very long ridges apparently formed when sub - glacial streams or rivers deposited sedimentary materials.
sentences.cn: 蛇形丘显然是冰下河溪的沉积物堆积而成的很长的垄岗.
她冷若冰霜的美令人倾倒。

sentences.en: His use of the honorific'sir " would multiply while he assumed a glacial demeanor.
sentences.cn: 他会摆出一副冷若冰霜的样子,并不断使用 “ 阁下 ” 这种尊称.

sentences.en: Inside the jeep the atmosphere was glacial.
sentences.cn: 吉普车里的气氛相当冷淡。

sentences.en: She gave me a glacial smile.
Testing proves adding 5 % glacial acetic acid is suitable.
sentences.cn: 经试验,冰醋酸的加入量以5%为宜.

sentences.en: The U - shape of some glacial valleys may be due also to deposition.
sentences.cn: 某些U型冰川谷也可能起因于沉积作用.

sentences.en: The uranium deposits are obscured by sand, peat and glacial drift.
sentences.cn: 铀矿床被砂子, 泥炭和冰碛物所覆盖.

sentences.en: There were evidences of glacial action on the rocks.
sentences.cn: 这些岩石上有冰河留下的痕迹.

sentences.en: These giant stones are part of an ancient glacial deposit.
sentences.cn: 这些巨石是古冰川沉积物的一部分.

sentences.en: Two main glacial epochs affected both areas during the last 100 million years of Precambrian times.
sentences.cn: 在前寒武纪的最后1亿年中，两个主要的冰川时期对两个地区都产生了影响。

sentences.en: Two thirds of the continent was covered in ice during glacial periods.
sentences.cn: 该大陆的三分之二地区在冰河时代被冰覆盖着.

words.tran_cn: 受到冰河作用的；冻结成冰的

trans.tran_cn: <地>冰的，冰河[川]的，冰河期的，极冷的
trans.tran_en: a glacial look or expression is extremely unfriendly
